name: McSync
short: Sync Minecraft usernames with Discord and reward via RCON.
description: Allows users to sync their Minecraft username, confirm in-game presence, and receive rewards via RCON. Includes role restrictions and admin management.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs, Minecraft usernames, and sync status for linking purposes. Data can be removed via unsync or full config reset.
